remarks: Lemma for isomorphism H of a lattice meet.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Mar-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dihmeetlem3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem3.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem3.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem3.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem3.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem3N $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( X ./\ Y ) .<_ W ) /\ ( ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) /\ ( Q .\/ ( X ./\ W ) ) = X ) /\ ( ( R e. A /\ -. R .<_ W ) /\ ( R .\/ ( Y ./\ W ) ) = Y ) ) -> Q =/= R ) $.
